title: HW 1

Question 1
Prof says make a chart

#|echo: false
print('Hello World')

Hello World

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

Matplotlib created a temporary cache directory at /tmp/matplotlib-zvpz9k6s because the default path (/home/jovyan/.config/matplotlib) is not a writable directory; it is highly recommended to set the MPLCONFIGDIR environment variable to a writable directory, in particular to speed up the import of Matplotlib and to better support multiprocessing.

import numpy as np
x = np.linspace(0, 10, 100)
y = np.sin(x)
plt.plot(x, y)
plt.title('Sine Wave')
plt.xlabel('x')
plt.ylabel('sin(x)')
plt.grid()
plt.savefig('sine_wave.png')
plt.show()









import sys
print("Python version:", sys.version)
